<style>
.publication-card {
    background: #f8f9fa;

}
.publication-title {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: 8px;

    color: #2c3e50;
}
.authors {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    margin-bottom: 6px;

    line-height: 1.3;
}
.journal-info {
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    font-style: italic;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    color: #6c757d;
    display: inline-block;
    margin-right: 15px;
}
.metrics {
    display: none;
}
.publication-meta {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 8px;
}
.doi-link {
    color: #007bff;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    padding: 3px 8px;
    border: 1px solid #007bff;
    border-radius: 12px;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
    display: inline-block;
}
.doi-link:hover {
    background: #007bff;
    color: white;
}
.highlight-author {
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #2c3e50;
}
.year-title {
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #2c3e50;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #007bff;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .publication-meta {
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: flex-start;
        gap: 8px;
    }
    
    .publication-card {
        padding: 12px 15px;
    }
    
    .year-title {
        font-size: 1.5rem;
    }
}
</style>
